fields.name: invite_vio_account
fields.html:
You've been invited to join VIO

You’re one step away from an entirely new visual scheduling experience and , staying connected to friends, family, and businesses.

 

DOWNLOAD VIO

fields.name: invite_event_existing_account
fields.html:
Hello {{ name }},

You are invited to the following event:

{{ event_name }}

  • {{ time_from }}
  • {{ time_to }}
  • {{ location_name }}
  • {{ location_address }}

ATTEND EVENT

fields.name: email_verification_code
fields.html:
Dear Vio User,

This verification code is used for {{ action }}:

{{ code }}

For security reasons, this code will expire in {{ timeout|floatformat }} minutes. Please do not disclose this code to others.

Vio Team

This is an automated email, please do not reply.

fields.name: invite_friend
fields.html:
Dear User,

{{full_name}} wants to see you in vio app, please follow: {{link}}

Vio Team

This is an automated email, please do not reply.

fields.name: user_report
fields.html:
User Report ID: #{{report_id}}

System has received a report from User ID: #{{reporter}}|{{reporter_name}}

To ID: #{{target}} | {{target_name}}

Type: {{target_type}}

Report type: {{report_type}}

Message: {{description}}

Status: {{status}}

Open date: {{open_date}}

Vio Team

This is an automated email, please do not reply.

fields.name: Share event via email - English
fields.html:
Hi there!

{{ sender_name }} has invited you to join "{{ event_name }}" event at VIO. Use the button below to install VIO app and enjoy event with your friends:

JOIN EVENT NOW

fields.name: Share profile via email - English
fields.html:
Hi there!

{{ sender_name }} has shared you a profile "{{ profile_name }}" at VIO. Use the button below to install VIO app and following this profile with your friends:

VIEW PROFILE NOW

fields.name: Share media post via email - English
fields.html:
Hi there!

{{ sender_name }} has shared you a media post at VIO. Use the button below to install VIO app and enjoy the post with your friends:

VIEW MEDIA POST NOW
